00055 // OTAU commands
00056 // list of commands id
00057 #define QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST_ID                 0x01
00058 #define QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE_ID                0x02
00059 #define IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST_ID                      0x03
00060 #define IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE_ID                     0x05
00061 #define UPGRADE_END_REQUEST_ID                      0x06
00062 #define UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE_ID                     0x07
00063 
00064 #define DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST(queryNextImageReqInd) \
00065         DEFINE_COMMAND(queryNextImageReq, QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST_ID, \
00066         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE), \
00067         queryNextImageReqInd)
00068 
00069 #define DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE(queryNextImageRespInd) \
00070         DEFINE_COMMAND(queryNextImageResp, QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE_ID, \
00071         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE), \
00072         queryNextImageRespInd)
00073 
00074 #define DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST(imageBlockReqInd)  \
00075         DEFINE_COMMAND(imageBlockReq, IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST_ID, \
00076         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE), \
00077         imageBlockReqInd)
00078 
00079 #define DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE(imageBlockRespInd) \
00080         DEFINE_COMMAND(imageBlockResp, IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE_ID, \
00081         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE), \
00082         imageBlockRespInd)
00083 
00084 #define DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_REQUEST(upgradeEndReqInd) \
00085         DEFINE_COMMAND(upgradeEndReq, UPGRADE_END_REQUEST_ID, \
00086         COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE), \
00087         upgradeEndReqInd)
00088 
00089 #define DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE(upgradeEndRespInd) \
00090         DEFINE_COMMAND(upgradeEndResp, UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE_ID, \
00091         COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE), \
00092         upgradeEndRespInd)
00093 
00094 #define OTAU_COMMANDS(queryNextImageReqInd, queryNextImageRespInd, imageBlockReqInd, imageBlockRespInd,  \
00095                       upgradeEndReqInd, upgradeEndRespInd)                                               \
00096         DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_REQUEST(queryNextImageReqInd),                                           \
00097         DEFINE_QUERY_NEXT_IMAGE_RESPONSE(queryNextImageRespInd),                                         \
00098         DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_REQUEST(imageBlockReqInd),                                                    \
00099         DEFINE_IMAGE_BLOCK_RESPONSE(imageBlockRespInd),                                                  \
00100         DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_REQUEST(upgradeEndReqInd),                                                    \
00101         DEFINE_UPGRADE_END_RESPONSE(upgradeEndRespInd)

00113 #define OTAU_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands)        \
00114   {                                                                           \
00115     .id = OTAU_CLUSTER_ID,                                                    \
00116     .options = {                                                              \
00117       .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                        \
00118       .security = ZCL_DEFAULT_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                               \
00119       .ackRequest = 1,                                                        \
00120       .reserved = 0},                                                         \
00121     .attributesAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,            \
00122     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                   \
00123     .commandsAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                       \
00124     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                        \
00125   }
00126 
00127 /***************************************************************************/
00137 #define OTAU_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00138   {                                                                    \
00139     .id = OTAU_CLUSTER_ID,                                             \
00140     .options = {                                                       \
00141       .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                 \
00142       .security = ZCL_DEFAULT_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                        \
00143       .ackRequest = 1,                                                 \
00144       .reserved = 0},                                                  \
00145     .attributesAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,     \
00146     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                            \
00147     .commandsAmount = ZCL_OTAU_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                \
00148     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                 \
00149   }
00150 
00151 #define DEFINE_OTAU_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) OTAU_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)

00217 typedef union PACK
00218 {
00219   uint16_t memAlloc;

00221   {

00223     uint16_t deviceSpecificFile               : 1;
00224     uint16_t hardwareVersionPresent           : 1;

00226   };
